thread.title: RBS sells asset manager Cairn Capital to Mediobanca as it focuses on core UK bank
thread.title_full: RBS sells asset manager Cairn Capital to Mediobanca as it focuses on core UK bank

author: Tim Wallace
title: RBS sells asset manager Cairn Capital to Mediobanca as it focuses on core UK bank
text: RBS sells asset manager Cairn Capital to Mediobanca as it focuses on core UK bank The Italian bank wants to become a major international player in the asset management industry Royal Bank of Scotland is selling its stake in the asset manager that it helped found, as it slims the group down to focus on retail and business lending Photo: Getty Images
